name: One button dungeon
description:
Those heroes are always here to bother poor monsters and their master!

Once again, they want to enter your dungeon and steal your precious treasures!

Use the power of a single button to summon your minions and defend the dungeon as long as you can.

--

This is my first ever game jam, and my first attempt at using Godot.

Looking forward to reading your comments and feedbacks!

Cheers!

--

Credits: music by Jordan Han
